# Bio
Clarissa is a certified arborist and trained environmental data scientist with 
expertise in urban forestry nonprofit management. She currently works as a 
technical expert for at City of LA Public Works' Office of Forest Management. 
She enjoys talking about her cross-eyed cat, swapping delicious baking recipes, 
and thinking about how people interact with built and wild environments.

**Bren School of Environmental Science & Management, University of California: Santa Barbara**\
Master of Environmental Data Science (June 2022)\
**Occidental College** | Los Angeles, CA\
Bachelor of Arts in Urban & Environmental Policy (May 2013)\
